channel.title: New server/client release-Godsword speacials-Dclaws-474interfaces
channel.description:
- [b]Melee System[/b] -
474 godswords & have correct Speacials & GFX. 474 Whip emote. 474 Veng Emote/GFX. 474 Veng Other Emote/GFX. 474 Rune Defender Block. Dragon Claws Correct Emote Only hits twice on NPC's but 4 Times on players (i increased the damage). Melee Following 100%. Anchor Emote 100% No GFX though You can add easily.
- [b]Mage System[/b] -
I fixed the autocast :) On heaven Pkz release 2.0 auto cast didn't work i fixed it works 100% now. Instant Barrage. Mage Following Works 99%. Blitz Timer set to 4 Seconds (will blitz every 4 seconds with auto cast). 474 Magic Book for Modern,Ancients and Lunar imported. Updated Magic Shop Prices etc... Not much more then that.
- [b]Range System[/b] -
474 Cross bow shooting emote. 474 Cross bow Running emote. 474 Range Stand is in the class 20 for animations just find it and you can set it in Server if you want :). Range Following 99%.
- [b]NPC System[/b] -
I made 2 NPC's From Ballscape (King of the caves & Crazy Syco Bitch) Credits to Owner Of Ballscape. 100% Animted Bandos boss / Minions. 100% Animated Zamorak boss / Minions. 100% Animated Saradomin Boss / Minions. 100% Animated Armadyl boss / Minions. Added Gnome to talk to at talk to him to get to the King of the caves / Crazy Bitch.
- [b]Mini Games[/b] -
Pest Controll 100%. Fight Caves 100% 1 wave = Jad (Fixed this up alot). Fight Pits 100%. Fun pk 99%. Barros 80% just go in the tunnels and kill each of the barrows brothers.
- [b]Shops[/b] -
Updated Shops alot and Changed home to edgeville. Made Donor Shop also with Points :). Updated Shop at donator Zone. Made pure shop. Made Party Pete Donator Shop :).
- [b]Interface[/b] -
Custom Made Donorpoints on Quest list (tells you your amount). 474 Equipment Interface. 474 Items capt on death interface. Some other i can't Think of right now.
- [b]Pictures[/b] -
Armadyl Godsword Speacial
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/a47ksh.gif[/img]
Saradomin Godsword Speacial
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2e37r7s.gif[/img]
Zamorak Godsword peacial
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/25f21q9.gif[/img]
Bandos Godsword Speacial
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/sllbtc.gif[/img]
[b]I will be adding Skillcape Emotes in the next client that will be out in about 2 weeks[/b]
50% to me
50% to the other people with the tutorials
Virus Scan = Clean
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2s7fc75.png[/img]
[b]Client/Server pack download[/b] - http://www.mediafire.com/?jgmgtzqmmwm

item.title: New server/client release-Godsword speacials-Dclaws-474interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Slurpee_FTW Slurpee FTW
item.description:
@Slurpee_FTW wrote:

[quote=“MR.FATASS, post:23, topic:343895”][quote author=Lost Valentino link=topic=440282.msg3236592#msg3236592 date=1276531377]

okay okay everone calm down…its not virus and not trojans its one of the fake virus that people make out of shortcuts…to make one heres what you do
1.)right click on desktop
2.)scroll to new and click on shortcut
3.)then a screen will pop up , type in shudown -s -t 60 -c “put a comment you would want for it to say here” for him it was trojans activated ,keylogers activated.and then your computer shuts down.but do not worry its not a real virus.its just a prank , just to scare you and if you dont believe me then just go on youtube and search how to make a fake virus…well there no harm done just big panic attacks from me because i though it was one as well until i right clicked and click on properties and i seen what was in the comments…yeah thats how i found out it was one of those fake virus…soo people do not panic its fake.
4.)and if you wanna stop any application like this go to
start -> run -> type in shutdown -a

shutdown -a simply means abort the application

so you made a new acc and do now say it isnt a virus lol ?
[/quote]

umm im not even who you even saying i am…wtf are you talking about…i made this account long time ago , and sense i dont like mopar forums that much i use google but sense google is down for a few days i came back to mopar and i know what kind of prank it is…and thats all it is…a prank…[/quote]

Omg guys seriously its a prank i made it look like a virus it’s nothing all it is is a program/code that shuts down you PC all you have to do is start it back up no damage done i was just screwing around cuz i got bored and i have a life jesus lol who thought it was funny

And yes locksmin i did leech from you lol sorry but idc really lol

Read full topic
